meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>carry</kanji> <kanji>happiness</kanji> with you, you look at the good side of everything and end up having really <vocabulary>good luck</vocabulary>. Someone who carries happiness will be really lucky in life.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
